verses.roman:
ebe saba vaiṣṇava gauḍa-deśe cali' gela
ebe prabhura nimantraṇe avasara haila

synonyms: ebe—now; saba—all; vaiṣṇava—devotees; gauḍa-deśe—to Bengal; cali, gela—have returned; ebe—now; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nimantraṇe—for invitations; avasara haila—there is a chance.
translation: Since all the Vaiṣṇavas had returned to Bengal, there was a good chance that the Lord would accept an invitation.
